QuestData.Title: Adventurers Wanted: Razorfen Kraul
QuestData.Description: The Warchief has requested that any able-bodied adventurer head to Razorfen Kraul, in the southernmost part of the Southern Barrens, immediately!$B$BAuld Stonespire needs assistance in stopping the quilboar before they begin to spread further! If you so choose, head to Razorfen Kraul and speak with Auld Stonespire, a wise and respected shaman, to help stop the menace.
